name: Component Exporter
description:
Export component libraries of any size into cloud accessible assets in json format, svg quick copy html code, and downloadable archives.


Currently in Beta and free to use.


  • Bulk export large component libraries.
  • Export team published components.
  • Dedicated collection web pages for sharing with teams or anyone.
  • Export to json, downloadable archives, and pngs.
  • CI/CD ready REST API.


Learn more here, docs.


Feedback, support, and questions are welcome. Email me at artem@outermeasure.com or DM me on Twitter https://twitter.com/outermeasure.
